name: Deliverance (itch) (CatapultingWizard)
description: Gameplay Video : https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1074145557817339964/1079476117016150087/Unity_IMJ58N3rQ4.gif https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1074145557817339964/1079475296572547124/Unity_2TOmZqoQ0P.gif https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/1074145557817339964/1079476424177618984/Unity_D3UKidYXGz.gif Controls : Use WASD to move Rotate camera with Q and E Press F to interact with blue spirits Left click to hook out of range enemies and smite enemies within range Team Members : Gavin Philips (Programming), Shane Smith (Music and Sound Design), Logan Wright (Art), Keegan McQuin (3D Assets) Software : Unity, Blender, ClipStudio Paint, Ableton, CGAxis [This game has multiple endings] (edited)
